summary: this is a bat file that will allow you to marry almost any npc in skyrim only exception is unique npcs like serana and over npcs who are aggresive to you and over people like bandits and trolls
descriptionHtml:
it annoyed me how nearly every npc i talked to didnt ask me to marry her! lol sounds so wrong but you know where im coming from... any way so i made this!!!! lol im just totally f""ked atm so i cant think of owt to say lol bye. hope you like

1. download - click download button.
2. unzip - unzip it using winrar or 7z --classed as installing.
2. install - put in skyrim's data folder --- steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data... somet like that
3. load skyrim - double click skyrimlauncher. lol
4. open console - use the ` button under the esc key
5. click on an npc - click on npc. lol
6. type the file name - type bat marry
7. wear an amulet of mara and talk to them...
